text: Big is a 1988 American fantasy comedy-drama movie directed by Penny Marshall. It stars Tom Hanks as Adult Josh Baskin, a young boy who makes a wish "to be big" and then becomes an adult the next day. The movie also stars Elizabeth Perkins, David Moscow as young Josh, John Heard and Robert Loggia Big had two Academy Award nominations for Best Actor (Hanks) and Best Original Screenplay. ==References== Category:1988 fantasy movies Category:1988 comedy-drama movies Category:American fantasy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Penny Marshall Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies about rapid human age change Category:Movies adapted into plays
